about:
DevOps/SRE/DevSecOps Engineer with 5 years of experience in cloud-native infrastructure, automation, and secure software delivery. Skilled in designing and implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Harness, GitHub Actions, and scripting languages like Bash, Shell, and Python to accelerate build and release processes. Strong expertise in containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes â€“ AKS, OpenShift) for scalable deployments across AWS and Azure environments.

Proficient in Infrastructure as Code using Terraform and Ansible for automated provisioning and configuration. Experienced in troubleshooting deployment, infrastructure, and networking issues in dynamic virtual and cloud environments. Adept at integrating security tools (Checkmarx, Veracode, BlackDuck, Sysdig, SonarQube, CxOne) into CI/CD workflows and implementing best practices for compliance. Skilled in monitoring and observability with Prometheus, Grafana, and cAdvisor to ensure system reliability and performance. Strong background in Linux administration and Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) to deliver secure, resilient, and high-performing systems.
